title: i did it gd
body: i beat chaugmar after idk 15+ attempts.  fucker kept double blood sucking or whatever its called my healer.  the ppl that made this game really thought rpg's are too easy these days lol.  this game is a beast, i dont even remember the last time an rpg made me plan out my moves so much.  most rpg you just spam your best attacks and heals and win, this game...  not so much.  and i hear its only supposed to get harder from here.
